segments.text: In this kitchen, the woman stands at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet on, basin full, water flowing over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forms on the tile floor beneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing the plate carefully with the towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy climbs the stool toward the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is for the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands by, hand extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool tilts slightly, unstable on the ground.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above shows the tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains pulled back for the daylight view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene builds quiet tension unobserved.
segments.speaker: PAR
